nodes.text: Peg Shar I was an industrial world in the Halla sector of the Mid Rim, Rimward of Bimmisaari on the Lesser Lantillian Route. By 32 BBY, Peg Shar I had direct representation in the Galactic Senate. The Senate pod of Peg Shar I was located below the Senate pod of Mon Calamari, as was the Senator's office in the Senate Building.
